text: FIFA Football 2004 is a 2003 association football simulation video game in Electronic Arts' FIFA series created by EA Canada and published by Electronic Arts. It was released for the Playstation, Playstation 2, Xbox, GameCube, Game Boy Advance, N-Gage and Microsoft Windows. title: FIFA Football 2004
